languages.text: "Благодарю за вашу доброту, Леди-Навигатор. Возможно... это к лучшему для всех причастных".
"Thank you for your kindness, Lady Navigator. Perhaps... it is for the best for everyone involved."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю за вашу доброту, Леди-Навигатор. Возможно... это к лучшему для всех причастных".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for your kindness, Lady Navigator. Perhaps... it is for the best for everyone involved."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “感谢你的好意，导航者女士。或许……对所有人来说，这才是最好的结果。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your kindness, Lady Navigator. Perhaps... it is for the best for everyone involved."

traits.locale_text: “感谢你的好意，导航者女士。或许……对所有人来说，这才是最好的结果。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Votre gentillesse me touche, dame navigatrice. C'est sans doute mieux ainsi... pour tout le monde. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your kindness, Lady Navigator. Perhaps... it is for the best for everyone involved."

traits.locale_text: « Votre gentillesse me touche, dame navigatrice. C'est sans doute mieux ainsi... pour tout le monde. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Gracias por su amabilidad, lady Navegante. Tal vez... sea lo mejor para todos».
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your kindness, Lady Navigator. Perhaps... it is for the best for everyone involved."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias por su amabilidad, lady Navegante. Tal vez... sea lo mejor para todos».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「航宙士様、ご親切にありがとうございました。おそらく…それが関係者全員にとって最善なのだろう」
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your kindness, Lady Navigator. Perhaps... it is for the best for everyone involved."

traits.locale_text: 「航宙士様、ご親切にありがとうございました。おそらく…それが関係者全員にとって最善なのだろう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Danke für Eure Güte, Lady Navigator. Vielleicht ... ist es für alle Beteiligten das Beste."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your kindness, Lady Navigator. Perhaps... it is for the best for everyone involved."

traits.locale_text: "Danke für Eure Güte, Lady Navigator. Vielleicht ... ist es für alle Beteiligten das Beste."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Thank you for your kindness, Lady Navigator. Perhaps... it is for the best for everyone involved."

languages.text: "Çok naziksin Leydi Rotacı. Kim bilir... Belki de herkes için en uygunu budur."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your kindness, Lady Navigator. Perhaps... it is for the best for everyone involved."

traits.locale_text: "Çok naziksin Leydi Rotacı. Kim bilir... Herkes için en uygunu budur belki de."
